name: 林子喬
objective: Discuss the theories and features of kinds of AC electric machines, including: (1)A Simple Loop in a Uniform Magnetic Field; (2) The Rotating Magnetic Field; (3) Induced Voltage and Torque in AC Machines; (4)Machine Power Flows and Losses; (5)Synchronous Machines; (6)Induction Motors.
schedule:
Wk1: Course Introduction and Rules 
Wk2~Wk5: AC Machinery Fundamentals
Wk6~Wk8: Synchronous Machines 
Wk9: Midterm Exam 
Wk10: Midterm Commentary & Synchronous Machines
Wk11~Wk13: Synchronous Machines
Wk14~Wk17: Induction Motors
Wk18: Final Exam
materials:
Textbook: 
Stephen J. Chapman , Electric Machinery Fundamentals , 5th edition (Feb. 18, 2011), 東華書局代理
